utilities package

Submodules

utilities.lists module

utilities.lists.posiciones_tratantes = {'Administrador', 'Psicóloco Educativo', 'Psicólogo Clínico', 'Psiquiatra'}

The list_encounter_types variable contains different types of encounters or sessions. These can include individual therapy, crisis intervention, counseling, reports, certificates, interviews, family therapy, couples therapy, daycare records, psychological assessments, occupational assessments, licensing assessments, containment, home visits, process closure, play therapy, academic counseling, special educational needs, vocational and career guidance.

The tipos_de_paciente variable contains different types of patients. These can include students, graduates, workers, teachers, retirees, and family members.

The facultades variable contains different faculties or schools. These can include Architecture and Urbanism, Arts, Agricultural Sciences, Economics and Administration, Hospitality Sciences, Medical Sciences, Chemical Sciences, Philosophy, Engineering, Law, Dentistry, and Psychology.

The posiciones_tratantes variable is a set of different treating positions. These can include Clinical Psychologist, Educational Psychologist, Psychiatrist, and Administrator.

utilities.session_state_utilities module

utilities.session_state_utilities.get_or_create_session_state(key: str, default_value: any)[source]

Retrieves the value from the Streamlit session state with the given key. If the key doesn’t exist, initializes it with the default value.

Parameters:

  • key (str) – The key to retrieve or create in the session state.

  • default_value (any) – The default value to set if the key doesn’t exist.

Returns:

The value associated with the key in the session state.

Return type:

any

utilities.time_utilities module

utilities.time_utilities.calculate_age(birth_date)[source]

Calculates the age based on the provided birth date.

Parameters:

birth_date (str) – The birth date in the format Y-M-D.

Returns:

The calculated age.

Return type:

int

utilities.time_utilities.get_today()[source]

Retrieves the current date in the US/Eastern timezone and returns it as a string in the format Y-M-D.

Returns:

The current date formatted as Y-M-D.

Return type:

str

utilities.view_utilities module

utilities.view_utilities.clean(subheader, instructions='')[source]

Displays a clean header section with an image, subheader, and optional instructions.

Parameters:

  • subheader (str) – The subheader text to display.

  • instructions (str, optional) – Additional instructions to display. Defaults to “”.

utilities.view_utilities.load_image()[source]

Loads and returns an image from the specified path.

Returns:

The loaded image.

Return type:

PIL.Image.Image

utilities.view_utilities.load_logo()[source]

Loads and returns the logo image.

Returns:

The loaded logo image.

Return type:

PIL.Image.Image

utilities.view_utilities.show_header(header_container)[source]

Displays the header section.

Parameters:

header_container – The container for the header section.

utilities.view_utilities.show_header_patient_lookup(header_container)[source]

Displays the header section for patient lookup.

Parameters:

header_container – The container for the header section.
